summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of GuessIt football prediction platform. All backend API endpoints and frontend pages working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (GET /api/) returns correct message
Backend health check endpoint (GET /api/health) returns healthy status
Error handling for invalid endpoints (404) works correctly
Homepage loads with GuessIt branding and complete UI structure
Navigation tabs (Popular, Top Live, Soon, Ended) are present
League filters (Premier League, UCL, La Liga, Serie A) are functional
Theme toggle button works correctly (light/dark mode switching)
Live match updates and WebSocket status indicators work
Grid/List view toggle buttons are present and functional
Login page loads with complete form (email, password, Google auth, register link)
Register page loads with complete form (email, password, confirm password, Google auth)
Admin login page loads correctly at /itguess/admin/login
How It Works page loads with proper navigation and content
Leaderboard page loads with proper table structure and data
All navigation links (How It Works, Leaderboard, About Us, News, Contact) are present
